name: War Legends
description: Tank battles, genius weapons and never-ending war, this is the world of War Legends. A military-themed MOBA game developed on the Polygon Blockchain, it offers Play-and-Earn elements and a non-fungible token (NFT) driven economy. The game takes place in a world where WW2 never ended and new impressive weapons and defenses were invented. Join the battle and lead your team to victory using the millions of tank builds and team combinations to claim your rightful title as a War Legend.
